Game Info.Name: Idle Skill Tree
Game Info.Author: Dramora9879
Game Info.Description: This is an idle game that is focused on clicking to get points, using those points to buy experience which in turn increases your level. Once you hit the level-cap you will gain access to the rebirth and rebirth upgrades.

Upgrades System.Description: There are ten sets of upgrades: Base Upgrade Sets, Rebirth Upgrade Sets, Prestige Upgrade Sets, and Regression Upgrade Sets. These sets are used to progress through the game.

Base Upgrade Sets.Main: These are the Main Base Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the pre-rebirth stage. They are reset when you reach the level-cap and do a rebirth.
Base Upgrade Sets.Permanent: These are the Permanent Base Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the pre-rebirth stage. They are not reset when you reach the level-cap and do a rebirth.

Rebirth Upgrade Sets.Main: These are the Main Rebirth Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the post-rebirth stage. They are reset when you reach the level-cap and do a rebirth.
Rebirth Upgrade Sets.Permanent: These are the Permanent Rebirth Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the post-rebirth stage. They are not reset when you reach the level-cap and do a rebirth.

Prestige Upgrade Sets.Main: These are the Main Prestige Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the prestige stage. They are reset when you reach the level-cap and do a prestige.
Prestige Upgrade Sets.Permanent: These are the Permanent Prestige Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the prestige stage. They are not reset when you reach the level-cap and do a prestige.

Regression Upgrade Sets.Main: These are the Main Regression Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the regression stage. They are reset when you reach the level-cap and do a regression.
Regression Upgrade Sets.Permanent: These are the Permanent Regression Upgrades, they are ten upgrades that are used to progress through the regression stage. They are not reset when you reach the level-cap and do a regression.

Achievements System.Description: There are a lot of achievements, each achievement is also linked to an upgrade. Once you complete an achievement, you will unlock the upgrade.

Skill Tree System.Description: There are a lot of skill tree nodes, each node is linked to a skill. Once you unlock a node, you will unlock the ability to spend skill points on the skill. The skill-tree is also linked to an upgrade. Once you unlock a skill-tree node, you will unlock the ability to spend skill points on the skill-tree. You can also reset the skill-tree to get back all the skill points you spent on it.

Progression System.Description: The progression system is used to progress through the game. It is a series of stages that you can progress through by completing achievements, skill-tree nodes, and by buying upgrades.
